# tokenizer

**Instance Property**

An input tokenizer that provides information about the granularity of text units.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tokenizer: any UITextInputTokenizer { get }
```

## Discussion

Standard units of granularity include characters, words, lines, and paragraphs. In most cases, you may lazily create and assign an instance of a subclass of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInputStringTokenizer] for this purpose. If you require different behavior than this system-provided tokenizer, you can create a custom tokenizer that adopts the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInputTokenizer] protocol.

## Tokenizing input text

- **UITextInputTokenizer**: A tokenizer, which is an object that allows the text input system to evaluate text units of different granularities.
